snippet: An American advocacy group is seeking to pressure the International Monetary Fund to withdraw all its holdings in Iran’s central bank or to suspend Iranian membership.
abstract: American advocacy group United Against Nuclear Iran seeks to pressure the International Monetary Fund to withdraw all its holdings in Iran’s central bank or to suspend Iranian membership; group has so far successfully pushed to isolate Iran economically through sanctions and business boycotts.
lead_paragraph: An American advocacy group is seeking to pressure the International Monetary Fund to withdraw all its holdings in Iran’s central bank or to suspend Iranian membership.

headline.seo: American Group Seeks Suspension of Iran from International Monetary Fund
headline.main: Group Seeks Suspension of Iran From I.M.F.
headline.print_headline: Group Seeks Suspension Of Iran From I.M.F.
